mapper.select: select id, name, brand_desc, pic_url, floor_price, add_time, update_time, delted from wanjia_brand where delted=0
mapper.insert: insert into wanjia_brand(name, brand_desc, pic_url, floor_price, add_time, update_time, delted) values (#{name},#{brandDesc},#{picUrl},#{floorPrice}, #{addTime},#{updateTime},#{delted})
mapper.select: select count(brand_id) from wanjia_goods where delted=0 and brand_id=#{id};
mapper.delete: update wanjia_brand set delted=1 where delted=0 and id=#{id}
